sentences.sContent: Hotels are generally of a good standard and not too expensive. Alternatively you could stay in an apartment.
sentences.sCn: 旅馆一般标准高并且不太贵。或者你可以住公寓。

words.tran: 供选择的；选择性的；交替的
二中择一；供替代的选择

trans.tranOther: You use alternatively to introduce a suggestion or to mention something different from what has just been stated.
